body_html:
@keotic Is using your following steps right now? Will the correct queue be used at test time?

Use "match_filenames_once" to feed data in the training phase.
Save model checkpoints with default 'tf.train.Saver()'
Use again 'match_filenames_once' with a different pattern to load the inference / test files.
Load previously saved model checkpoint for inference / test.

body:
@keotic Is using your following steps right now? Will the correct queue be used at test time? 

> 
> Use "match_filenames_once" to feed data in the training phase.
> Save model checkpoints with default 'tf.train.Saver()'
> Use again 'match_filenames_once' with a different pattern to load the inference / test files.
> Load previously saved model checkpoint for inference / test.
